message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $180. It's a great deal considering its value to you is $120.

Thank you for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, $180 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $120, which is the maximum I'm able to spend. Let me know if you're open to that.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $165. This is the lowest I can go while still making it worth my while to sell to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $165, but I'm still a bit too high. I'm really only able to go up to $135. This is a fair compromise, and it would allow us to both come away from this transaction satisfied.
I'm not willing to go as low as $135, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $155, which is the highest I can go without losing money on the deal. This is my final counteroffer.
